message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $190 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  Could you meet me halfway at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
